name: cp20231102-ZipInZip
signedGlobalXml:
<STEP-ProductInformation ContextID="Context1"  WorkspaceID="Main"  ExportTime="2023-11-02 13:50:14"    UseContextLocale="false">

  <Qualifiers>
    <Qualifier ID="en-US">
      <DimensionPointLink DimensionPointID="en-US"/>
    </Qualifier>
  </Qualifiers>

  <AttributeGroupList>

  <AttributeGroup ID="BasicInformation" ShowInWorkbench="true" ManuallySorted="false" ParentID="Attribute group root">
    <Name QualifierID="en-US">Basic Information</Name>
  </AttributeGroup>
  </AttributeGroupList>

  <AttributeList>

    <Attribute ID="ShortDescription" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="en-US">Short Description</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="100" InputMask=""/>
      <MetaData>
        <Value QualifierID="en-US" AttributeID="AttributeHelpText">Enter the short descriptor for the product to be shown on in-store shelving alongside the UPC</Value>
        <Value AttributeID="Completeness Score">10</Value>
      </MetaData>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="BasicInformation"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="HazardousMaterial" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" HierarchicalFiltering="false" ClassificationHierarchicalFiltering="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="en-US">Hazardous Material</Name>
      <ListOfValueLink ListOfValueID="YesNoRevisable"/>
      <MetaData>
        <Value QualifierID="en-US" AttributeID="AttributeHelpText">Does the item contain hazardous materials?</Value>
      </MetaData>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="BasicInformation"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="LongDescription" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="en-US">Long Description</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="100" InputMask=""/>
      <MetaData>
        <Value QualifierID="en-US" AttributeID="AttributeHelpText">Enter the complete title for the product</Value>
      </MetaData>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="BasicInformation"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="Channels" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="true" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="en-US">Sellable Channels</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="400" InputMask=""/>
      <MetaData>
        <Value QualifierID="en-US" AttributeID="AttributeHelpText">Will the product be sold in stores, online, or both?</Value>
      </MetaData>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="BasicInformation"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
    </Attribute>

  </AttributeList>
</STEP-ProductInformation>
